description: For what it's worth, just use Corebird.

Doesn't provide any functionality you couldn't get from opening Epiphany, navigating to Twitter and choosing 'Save as Web Application' from the menu, but if you're flipping through the store and want an easy way to access these services (especially since even native apps like Corebird can't and won't soon match the features of Twitter's web UI due to Twitter's pitiful API), it's a quick way to get to Twitter. Also you get a nicer, full-size icon without hacking the .desktop file.
Can anyone help me remove this horrible little piece of software? It seems to be stuck to my system like gum on the shoe. Won't uninstall.
Hierbei handelt es sich leider nicht um eine Twitter-App. Startet man das Programm, so öffnet es lediglich Twitter in einem Browser. Überflüssig.
Al abrir la aplicacion no hace nada, desintalada.
Ce n'est qu'un raccourci vers un navigateur Web et pas une vraie application !
